title: Students Arrested in Hong Kong Bomb Plot, Days After Police Stabbing
content:
1. Students Arrested in Hong Kong Bomb Plot, Days After Police Stabbing  The New York Times
  2. Hong Kong police reveal alleged plot to bomb train stations and courts  CNN
  3. 9 Arrested Over Alleged Plot To Plant Bombs Around Hong Kong  NPR
  4. 6 students among 9 arrested in alleged Hong Kong bomb plot  The Associated Press
  5. Hong Kong police arrest nine over alleged terrorist plot to bomb streets, courts, transport networks  South China Morning Post

localize.title: 香港の爆弾テロ計画で学生を逮捕、警察官刺殺事件の数日後に
在警察刺杀事件发生几天后，香港学生因炸弹阴谋被捕
在警察刺殺事件發生幾天後，香港學生因炸彈陰謀被捕
